content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Farhad, nice to meet you. I am not bound by any price limit. Make me an offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Given that it's a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center, I think a fair price would be 550 Euros per month.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I am not satisfied with your offer. Let's see if we can find a better deal.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
